name: Asana
description:
Nothing great is made alone, so why should we manage our projects that way? Asana and Figma work together to help teams move work forward—no matter which tool they’re in.


You can use the Asana widget to pull Asana projects and all of their associated tasks into the canvas to discuss and update as a team. Adjust due dates, assignees, tags, sections, projects, and any custom fields right in FigJam, while maintaining your source of truth in Asana. And, if new to-dos come up in a meeting, you can capture easily capture them as new tasks in Asana, and even link associated designs from Figma.


Learn more about how to use this widget with your team and try it out for yourself in this playground file: https://www.figma.com/community/file/1103759573623690161/
